pages.text: $(li)The Nautilus Shell is a hard material that can be used to craft $(l)Coralstone$() and $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/conduit)Conduits$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/drowned)Drowneds$(/l) rarely drop them upon death and they can rarely obtained during fishing too.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/wandering_trader)Wandering Traders$(/l) may sell them by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
$(li)Finally, you can obtain it smelting an Embedded Ammonite in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/blast_furnace)Blast Furnace$(/l) too.
